summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 34th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to a point 280 feet, more or less, north of West Ray Street; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12407 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
